"ALTER PROCEDURE [Searches].[GetRapidRecallList] ( --DECLARE @ClientId INT ,@DNIS VARCHAR(1000) ,@Tags VARCHAR(1000) ,@Status VARCHAR(50) ,@LicensingType INT = 0 ,@LicensingDetails VARCHAR(1000) ,@Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,@PageNumber INT = 1 ,@RowsPerPage INT = 10 ,@SortColumn VARCHAR(30) = 'DNIS' ,@IsAscendentSort BIT = 1 ) AS BEGIN
DECLARE @SqlCommand VARCHAR(max) ,@SortColumnReal VARCHAR(30) ,@SortType VARCHAR(4)
CREATE TABLE #tblTemp( DNIS VARCHAR(50) ,Tag1 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag2 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag3 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag4 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag5 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag6 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag7 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag8 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag9 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag10 VARCHAR (300) ,Licensed XML ,[Status] INT ,LastCDR DATETIME ,Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,RespOrg VARCHAR(100) ,ClientId INT ,ClientName VARCHAR(100) ,[Owner] VARCHAR(100) ,LicensingType INT ,LicensingFilter INT DEFAULT(1), RowNumber int )
---------------------------- -- Define column to sort ---------------------------- IF (@SortColumn IS NOT NULL) SET @SortColumnReal = CASE @SortColumn WHEN 'DNIS' THEN 'n.Number' WHEN 'Campaign' THEN 'dtmf.CampaignIdentifier' WHEN 'LastCDR' THEN 'LastCDR'--'c.[Start]' WHEN 'Vendor' THEN 'v.Name' WHEN 'RespOrg' THEN 'RespOrg' WHEN 'ClientId' THEN 'cl.ID' WHEN 'ClientName' THEN 'cl.Name' WHEN 'Owner' THEN 'Owner' WHEN '' THEN 'n.Number' ELSE @SortColumn
END ELSE SET @SortColumnReal = 'n.Number'
---------------------------- -- Define Type Sort ---------------------------- SET @SortType = CASE WHEN @IsAscendentSort = 1 THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END
---------------------------- -- Define Sql query ----------------------------
SELECT @SqlCommand = ' SELECT c1.ClientID, c1.DNIS, c1.[Start], c1.VendorID INTO #calls FROM Calls.Calls c1, ( SELECT c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS, MAX(c2.[Start]) AS LastDate FROM Calls.Calls c2 WHERE c2.ClientId = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ' GROUP BY c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS ) AS c3 WHERE c1.ClientID = c3.ClientID AND c1.DNIS = c3.DNIS AND c1.[Start] = c3.LastDate AND c1.ClientID = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ';
WITH PaginatedQuery AS ( SELECT DISTINCT n.Number AS DNIS ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 1) as Tag1 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 2) as Tag2 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 3) as Tag3 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 4) as Tag4 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 5) as Tag5 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 6) as Tag6 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 7) as Tag7 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 8) as Tag8 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 9) as Tag9 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 10) as Tag10
,CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS Status ,c.[Start] as LastCDR ,v.Name AS Vendor ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS RespOrg ,cl.ID AS ClientId ,cl.Name AS ClientName ,' + CHAR(3 9) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS Owner ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType + ') AS RowNumber FROM Dnis.Numbers n JOIN Dnis.LicensedNumbers ln ON ln.Number = n.Number JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ld ON ld.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ld.Number = ln.Number JOIN #calls AS c ON c.ClientID = ld.ClientID AND c.DNIS = ld.Number JOIN Vendors.Vendors v ON v.ID = c.VendorID JOIN Clients.Clients cl ON cl.ID = ln.ClientID WHERE 1=1 '
IF (@ClientId IS NOT NULL AND @ClientId <> -1) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND ln.ClientID = ' + CONVERT (VARCHAR (15),@ClientId) END
IF (@DNIS IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND n.Number IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@DNIS + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Tags IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + 'AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Clients.Tags T INNER JOIN Clients.TagAssignments TA ON ta.TagID = t.ID AND ta.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ta.SourceID = n.Number WHERE t.ClientId = ln.ClientId AND t.Id in (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@Tags + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ')) AND ta.AppliesSince <= SYSUTCDATETIME() AND (ta.AppliesUntil IS NULL OR ta.AppliesUntil >= SYSUTCDATETIME() ))' END
IF (@Status IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 --Ready ELSE 2 --Pending END IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Status + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' GROUP BY n.Number, dtmf.CampaignIdentifier, dtmf.MediaSource, dtmf.ProductCode, n.IsProvisioned, c.[Start], v.Name, cl.ID, cl.Name'
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType
SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ') '
DECLARE @SqlPagination VARCHAR(MAX) SET @SqlPagination = 'SELECT * FROM PaginatedQuery WHERE RowNumber BETWEEN ((' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ') - (' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '-1)) AND (' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '); '
--INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS, Campaign, Media, Product, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner]) INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS,Tag1, Tag2, Tag3, Tag4, Tag5, Tag6, Tag7, Tag8, Tag9, Tag10, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner], RowNumber) EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlPagination)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET #tblTemp.Licensed = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Details, #tblTemp.LicensingType = Dnis.LicensingDetails.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp INNER JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ON #tblTemp.ClientId = Dnis.LicensingDetails.ClientID AND #tblTemp.DNIS = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Number
IF @LicensingType > 0 BEGIN --PRINT 'Licensing Type: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), @LicensingType)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE LicensingType <> @LicensingType
IF LEN(ISNULL(@LicensingDetails, '')) > 0 BEGIN
DECLARE Ptr CURSOR FOR SELECT DNIS, Licensed, ClientId FROM #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 1
DECLARE @IdDnis VARCHAR(20), @XMLData XML, @IdCurClient INT
OPEN Ptr
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetail s, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END

"ALTER PROCEDURE [Searches].[GetRapidRecallList] ( --DECLARE @ClientId INT ,@DNIS VARCHAR(1000) ,@Tags VARCHAR(1000) ,@Status VARCHAR(50) ,@LicensingType INT = 0 ,@LicensingDetails VARCHAR(1000) ,@Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,@PageNumber INT = 1 ,@RowsPerPage INT = 10 ,@SortColumn VARCHAR(30) = 'DNIS' ,@IsAscendentSort BIT = 1 ) AS BEGIN
DECLARE @SqlCommand VARCHAR(max) ,@SortColumnReal VARCHAR(30) ,@SortType VARCHAR(4)
CREATE TABLE #tblTemp( DNIS VARCHAR(50) ,Tag1 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag2 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag3 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag4 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag5 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag6 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag7 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag8 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag9 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag10 VARCHAR (300) ,Licensed XML ,[Status] INT ,LastCDR DATETIME ,Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,RespOrg VARCHAR(100) ,ClientId INT ,ClientName VARCHAR(100) ,[Owner] VARCHAR(100) ,LicensingType INT ,LicensingFilter INT DEFAULT(1), RowNumber int )
---------------------------- -- Define column to sort ---------------------------- IF (@SortColumn IS NOT NULL) SET @SortColumnReal = CASE @SortColumn WHEN 'DNIS' THEN 'n.Number' WHEN 'Campaign' THEN 'dtmf.CampaignIdentifier' WHEN 'LastCDR' THEN 'LastCDR'--'c.[Start]' WHEN 'Vendor' THEN 'v.Name' WHEN 'RespOrg' THEN 'RespOrg' WHEN 'ClientId' THEN 'cl.ID' WHEN 'ClientName' THEN 'cl.Name' WHEN 'Owner' THEN 'Owner' WHEN '' THEN 'n.Number' ELSE @SortColumn
END ELSE SET @SortColumnReal = 'n.Number'
---------------------------- -- Define Type Sort ---------------------------- SET @SortType = CASE WHEN @IsAscendentSort = 1 THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END
---------------------------- -- Define Sql query ----------------------------
SELECT @SqlCommand = ' SELECT c1.ClientID, c1.DNIS, c1.[Start], c1.VendorID INTO #calls FROM Calls.Calls c1, ( SELECT c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS, MAX(c2.[Start]) AS LastDate FROM Calls.Calls c2 WHERE c2.ClientId = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ' GROUP BY c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS ) AS c3 WHERE c1.ClientID = c3.ClientID AND c1.DNIS = c3.DNIS AND c1.[Start] = c3.LastDate AND c1.ClientID = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ';
WITH PaginatedQuery AS ( SELECT DISTINCT n.Number AS DNIS ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 1) as Tag1 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 2) as Tag2 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 3) as Tag3 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 4) as Tag4 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 5) as Tag5 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 6) as Tag6 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 7) as Tag7 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 8) as Tag8 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 9) as Tag9 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 10) as Tag10
,CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS Status ,c.[Start] as LastCDR ,v.Name AS Vendor ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS RespOrg ,cl.ID AS ClientId ,cl.Name AS ClientName ,' + CHAR(3 9) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS Owner ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType + ') AS RowNumber FROM Dnis.Numbers n JOIN Dnis.LicensedNumbers ln ON ln.Number = n.Number JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ld ON ld.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ld.Number = ln.Number JOIN #calls AS c ON c.ClientID = ld.ClientID AND c.DNIS = ld.Number JOIN Vendors.Vendors v ON v.ID = c.VendorID JOIN Clients.Clients cl ON cl.ID = ln.ClientID WHERE 1=1 '
IF (@ClientId IS NOT NULL AND @ClientId <> -1) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND ln.ClientID = ' + CONVERT (VARCHAR (15),@ClientId) END
IF (@DNIS IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND n.Number IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@DNIS + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Tags IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + 'AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Clients.Tags T INNER JOIN Clients.TagAssignments TA ON ta.TagID = t.ID AND ta.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ta.SourceID = n.Number WHERE t.ClientId = ln.ClientId AND t.Id in (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@Tags + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ')) AND ta.AppliesSince <= SYSUTCDATETIME() AND (ta.AppliesUntil IS NULL OR ta.AppliesUntil >= SYSUTCDATETIME() ))' END
IF (@Status IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 --Ready ELSE 2 --Pending END IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Status + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' GROUP BY n.Number, dtmf.CampaignIdentifier, dtmf.MediaSource, dtmf.ProductCode, n.IsProvisioned, c.[Start], v.Name, cl.ID, cl.Name'
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType
SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ') '
DECLARE @SqlPagination VARCHAR(MAX) SET @SqlPagination = 'SELECT * FROM PaginatedQuery WHERE RowNumber BETWEEN ((' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ') - (' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '-1)) AND (' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '); '

UPDATE #tblTemp SET #tblTemp.Licensed = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Details, #tblTemp.LicensingType = Dnis.LicensingDetails.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp INNER JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ON #tblTemp.ClientId = Dnis.LicensingDetails.ClientID AND #tblTemp.DNIS = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Number
IF @LicensingType > 0 BEGIN --PRINT 'Licensing Type: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), @LicensingType)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE LicensingType <> @LicensingType
IF LEN(ISNULL(@LicensingDetails, '')) > 0 BEGIN
DECLARE Ptr CURSOR FOR SELECT DNIS, Licensed, ClientId FROM #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 1
DECLARE @IdDnis VARCHAR(20), @XMLData XML, @IdCurClient INT
OPEN Ptr
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetail s, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END
------------------------------ ---- Return final records ------------------------------ SELECT t.DNIS ,t.Licensed ,ISNULL(t.Tag1,'') Tag1 ,ISNULL(t.Tag2,'') Tag2 ,ISNULL(t.Tag3,'') Tag3 ,ISNULL(t.Tag4,'') Tag4 ,ISNULL(t.Tag5,'') Tag5 ,ISNULL(t.Tag6,'') Tag6 ,ISNULL(t.Tag7,'') Tag7 ,ISNULL(t.Tag8,'') Tag8 ,ISNULL(t.Tag9,'') Tag9 ,ISNULL(t.Tag10,'') Tag10 ,t.[Status] ,t.LastCDR ,t.Vendor ,t.RespOrg ,t.ClientId ,t.ClientName ,t.[Owner] ,t.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp t ORDER BY t. RowNumber
------------------------------ ---- Return Totals ------------------------------ DECLARE @SqlTotals as Varchar(max) SET @SqlTotals = 'SELECT T.Total as TotalRows, CASE WHEN T.Total%' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' = 0 THEN T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' ELSE (T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ')+1 END AS TotalPages From (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Total FROM PaginatedQuery) T' EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlTotals)
DROP TABLE #tblTemp
END "

IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END

END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END

"CREATE PROCEDURE [Searches].[GetRapidRecallList] ( --DECLARE @ClientId INT ,@DNIS VARCHAR(1000) ,@Tags VARCHAR(1000) ,@Status VARCHAR(50) ,@LicensingType INT = 0 ,@LicensingDetails VARCHAR(1000) ,@Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,@PageNumber INT = 1 ,@RowsPerPage INT = 10 ,@SortColumn VARCHAR(30) = 'DNIS' ,@IsAscendentSort BIT = 1 ) AS BEGIN
DECLARE @SqlCommand VARCHAR(max) ,@SortColumnReal VARCHAR(30) ,@SortType VARCHAR(4)
CREATE TABLE #tblTemp( DNIS VARCHAR(50) ,Tag1 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag2 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag3 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag4 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag5 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag6 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag7 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag8 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag9 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag10 VARCHAR (300) ,Licensed XML ,[Status] INT ,LastCDR DATETIME ,Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,RespOrg VARCHAR(100) ,ClientId INT ,ClientName VARCHAR(100) ,[Owner] VARCHAR(100) ,LicensingType INT ,LicensingFilter INT DEFAULT(1), RowNumber int )
---------------------------- -- Define column to sort ---------------------------- IF (@SortColumn IS NOT NULL) SET @SortColumnReal = CASE @SortColumn WHEN 'DNIS' THEN 'n.Number' WHEN 'Campaign' THEN 'dtmf.CampaignIdentifier' WHEN 'LastCDR' THEN 'LastCDR'--'c.[Start]' WHEN 'Vendor' THEN 'v.Name' WHEN 'RespOrg' THEN 'RespOrg' WHEN 'ClientId' THEN 'cl.ID' WHEN 'ClientName' THEN 'cl.Name' WHEN 'Owner' THEN 'Owner' WHEN '' THEN 'n.Number' ELSE @SortColumn
END ELSE SET @SortColumnReal = 'n.Number'
---------------------------- -- Define Type Sort ---------------------------- SET @SortType = CASE WHEN @IsAscendentSort = 1 THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END
---------------------------- -- Define Sql query ----------------------------
SELECT @SqlCommand = ' SELECT c1.ClientID, c1.DNIS, c1.[Start], c1.VendorID INTO #calls FROM Calls.Calls c1, ( SELECT c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS, MAX(c2.[Start]) AS LastDate FROM Calls.Calls c2 WHERE c2.ClientId = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ' GROUP BY c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS ) AS c3 WHERE c1.ClientID = c3.ClientID AND c1.DNIS = c3.DNIS AND c1.[Start] = c3.LastDate AND c1.ClientID = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ';
WITH PaginatedQuery AS ( SELECT DISTINCT n.Number AS DNIS ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 1) as Tag1 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 2) as Tag2 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 3) as Tag3 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 4) as Tag4 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 5) as Tag5 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 6) as Tag6 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 7) as Tag7 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 8) as Tag8 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 9) as Tag9 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 10) as Tag10
,CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS Status ,c.[Start] as LastCDR ,v.Name AS Vendor ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS RespOrg ,cl.ID AS ClientId ,cl.Name AS ClientName ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS Owner ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType + ') AS RowNumber FROM Dnis.Numbers n JOIN Dnis.LicensedNumbers ln ON ln.Number = n.Number JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ld ON ld.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ld.Number = ln.Number JOIN #calls AS c ON c.ClientID = ld.ClientID AND c.DNIS = ld.Number JOIN Vendors.Vendors v ON v.ID = c.VendorID JOIN Clients.Clients cl ON cl.ID = ln.ClientID WHERE 1=1 '
IF (@ClientId IS NOT NULL AND @ClientId <> -1) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND ln.ClientID = ' + CONVERT (VARCHAR (15),@ClientId) END
IF (@DNIS IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND n.Number IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@DNIS + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Tags IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + 'AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Clients.Tags T INNER JOIN Clients.TagAssignments TA ON ta.TagID = t.ID AND ta.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ta.SourceID = n.Number WHERE t.ClientId = ln.ClientId AND t.Id in (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@Tags + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ')) AND ta.AppliesSince <= SYSUTCDATETIME() AND (ta.AppliesUntil IS NULL OR ta.AppliesUntil >= SYSUTCDATETIME() ))' END
IF (@Status IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 --Ready ELSE 2 --Pending END IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Status + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' GROUP BY n.Number, dtmf.CampaignIdentifier, dtmf.MediaSource, dtmf.ProductCode, n.IsProvisioned, c.[Start], v.Name, cl.ID, cl.Name'
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType
SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ') '
DECLARE @SqlPagination VARCHAR(MAX) SET @SqlPagination = 'SELECT * FROM PaginatedQuery WHERE RowNumber BETWEEN ((' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ') - (' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '-1)) AND (' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '); '
--INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS, Campaign, Media, Product, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner]) INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS,Tag1, Tag2, Tag3, Tag4, Tag5, Tag6, Tag7, Tag8, Tag9, Tag10, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner], RowNumber) EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlPagination)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET #tblTemp.Licensed = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Details, #tblTemp.LicensingType = Dnis.LicensingDetails.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp INNER JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ON #tblTemp.ClientId = Dnis.LicensingDetails.ClientID AND #tblTemp.DNIS = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Number
IF @LicensingType > 0 BEGIN --PRINT 'Licensing Type: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), @LicensingType)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE LicensingType <> @LicensingType
IF LEN(ISNULL(@LicensingDetails, '')) > 0 BEGIN
DECLARE Ptr CURSOR FOR SELECT DNIS, Licensed, ClientId FROM #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 1
DECLARE @IdDnis VARCHAR(20), @XMLData XML, @IdCurClient INT
OPEN Ptr
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ' ,') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END
------------------------------ ---- Return final records ------------------------------ SELECT t.DNIS ,t.Licensed ,ISNULL(t.Tag1,'') Tag1 ,ISNULL(t.Tag2,'') Tag2 ,ISNULL(t.Tag3,'') Tag3 ,ISNULL(t.Tag4,'') Tag4 ,ISNULL(t.Tag5,'') Tag5 ,ISNULL(t.Tag6,'') Tag6 ,ISNULL(t.Tag7,'') Tag7 ,ISNULL(t.Tag8,'') Tag8 ,ISNULL(t.Tag9,'') Tag9 ,ISNULL(t.Tag10,'') Tag10 ,t.[Status] ,t.LastCDR ,t.Vendor ,t.RespOrg ,t.ClientId ,t.ClientName ,t.[Owner] ,t.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp t ORDER BY t. RowNumber
------------------------------ ---- Return Totals ------------------------------ DECLARE @SqlTotals as Varchar(max) SET @SqlTotals = 'SELECT T.Total as TotalRows, CASE WHEN T.Total%' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' = 0 THEN T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' ELSE (T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ')+1 END AS TotalPages From (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Total FROM PaginatedQuery) T' EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlTotals)
DROP TABLE #tblTemp
END

---------------------------- -- Define Type Sort ---------------------------- SET @SortType = CASE WHEN @IsAscendentSort = 1 THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END
---------------------------- -- Define Sql query ----------------------------
SELECT @SqlCommand = ' SELECT c1.ClientID, c1.DNIS, c1.[Start], c1.VendorID INTO #calls FROM Calls.Calls c1, ( SELECT c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS, MAX(c2.[Start]) AS LastDate FROM Calls.Calls c2 WHERE c2.ClientId = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ' GROUP BY c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS ) AS c3 WHERE c1.ClientID = c3.ClientID AND c1.DNIS = c3.DNIS AND c1.[Start] = c3.LastDate AND c1.ClientID = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ';
WITH PaginatedQuery AS ( SELECT DISTINCT n.Number AS DNIS ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 1) as Tag1 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 2) as Tag2 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 3) as Tag3 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 4) as Tag4 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 5) as Tag5 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 6) as Tag6 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 7) as Tag7 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 8) as Tag8 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 9) as Tag9 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 10) as Tag10
,CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS Status ,c.[Start] as LastCDR ,v.Name AS Vendor ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS RespOrg ,cl.ID AS ClientId ,cl.Name AS ClientName ,' + CHAR(39) +
'' + CHAR(39) + ' AS Owner ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType + ') AS RowNumber FROM Dnis.Numbers n JOIN Dnis.LicensedNumbers ln ON ln.Number = n.Number JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ld ON ld.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ld.Number = ln.Number JOIN #calls AS c ON c.ClientID = ld.ClientID AND c.DNIS = ld.Number JOIN Vendors.Vendors v ON v.ID = c.VendorID JOIN Clients.Clients cl ON cl.ID = ln.ClientID WHERE 1=1 '
IF (@ClientId IS NOT NULL AND @ClientId <> -1) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND ln.ClientID = ' + CONVERT (VARCHAR (15),@ClientId) END
IF (@DNIS IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND n.Number IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@DNIS + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Tags IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + 'AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Clients.Tags T INNER JOIN Clients.TagAssignments TA ON ta.TagID = t.ID AND ta.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ta.SourceID = n.Number WHERE t.ClientId = ln.ClientId AND t.Id in (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@Tags + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ')) AND ta.AppliesSince <= SYSUTCDATETIME() AND (ta.AppliesUntil IS NULL OR ta.AppliesUntil >= SYSUTCDATETIME() ))' END
IF (@Status IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 --Ready ELSE 2 --Pending END IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Status + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' GROUP BY n.Number, dtmf.CampaignIdentifier, dtmf.MediaSource, dtmf.ProductCode, n.IsProvisioned, c.[Start], v.Name, cl.ID, cl.Name'
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType
SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ') '
DECLARE @SqlPagination VARCHAR(MAX) SET @SqlPagination = 'SELECT * FROM PaginatedQuery WHERE RowNumber BETWEEN ((' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ') - (' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '-1)) AND (' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '); '
--INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS, Campaign, Media, Product, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner]) INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS,Tag1, Tag2, Tag3, Tag4, Tag5, Tag6, Tag7, Tag8, Tag9, Tag10, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner], RowNumber) EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlPagination)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET #tblTemp.Licensed = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Details, #tblTemp.LicensingType = Dnis.LicensingDetails.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp INNER JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ON #tblTemp.ClientId = Dnis.LicensingDetails.ClientID AND #tblTemp.DNIS = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Number
IF @LicensingType > 0 BEGIN --PRINT 'Licensing Type: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), @LicensingType)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE LicensingType <> @LicensingType
IF LEN(ISNULL(@LicensingDetails, '')) > 0 BEGIN
DECLARE Ptr CURSOR FOR SELECT DNIS, Licensed, ClientId FROM #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 1
DECLARE @IdDnis VARCHAR(20), @XMLData XML, @IdCurClient INT
OPEN Ptr
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ' ,') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END
------------------------------ ---- Return final records ------------------------------ SELECT t.DNIS ,t.Licensed ,ISNULL(t.Tag1,'') Tag1 ,ISNULL(t.Tag2,'') Tag2 ,ISNULL(t.Tag3,'') Tag3 ,ISNULL(t.Tag4,'') Tag4 ,ISNULL(t.Tag5,'') Tag5 ,ISNULL(t.Tag6,'') Tag6 ,ISNULL(t.Tag7,'') Tag7 ,ISNULL(t.Tag8,'') Tag8 ,ISNULL(t.Tag9,'') Tag9 ,ISNULL(t.Tag10,'') Tag10 ,t.[Status] ,t.LastCDR ,t.Vendor ,t.RespOrg ,t.ClientId ,t.ClientName ,t.[Owner] ,t.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp t ORDER BY t. RowNumber
------------------------------ ---- Return Totals ------------------------------ DECLARE @SqlTotals as Varchar(max) SET @SqlTotals = 'SELECT T.Total as TotalRows, CASE WHEN T.Total%' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' = 0 THEN T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' ELSE (T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ')+1 END AS TotalPages From (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Total FROM PaginatedQuery) T' EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlTotals)
DROP TABLE #tblTemp
END
"

IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ' ,') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END
------------------------------ ---- Return final records ------------------------------ SELECT t.DNIS ,t.Licensed ,ISNULL(t.Tag1,'') Tag1 ,ISNULL(t.Tag2,'') Tag2 ,ISNULL(t.Tag3,'') Tag3 ,ISNULL(t.Tag4,'') Tag4 ,ISNULL(t.Tag5,'') Tag5 ,ISNULL(t.Tag6,'') Tag6 ,ISNULL(t.Tag7,'') Tag7 ,ISNULL(t.Tag8,'') Tag8 ,ISNULL(t.Tag9,'') Tag9 ,ISNULL(t.Tag10,'') Tag10 ,t.[Status] ,t.LastCDR ,t.Vendor ,t.RespOrg ,t.ClientId ,t.ClientName ,t.[Owner] ,t.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp t ORDER BY t. RowNumber

DROP TABLE #tblTemp

"ALTER PROCEDURE [Searches].[GetRapidRecallList] ( --DECLARE @ClientId INT ,@DNIS VARCHAR(1000) ,@Tags VARCHAR(1000) ,@Status VARCHAR(50) ,@LicensingType INT = 0 ,@LicensingDetails VARCHAR(1000) ,@Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,@PageNumber INT = 1 ,@RowsPerPage INT = 10 ,@SortColumn VARCHAR(30) = 'DNIS' ,@IsAscendentSort BIT = 1 ) AS BEGIN
DECLARE @SqlCommand VARCHAR(max) ,@SortColumnReal VARCHAR(30) ,@SortType VARCHAR(4)
CREATE TABLE #tblTemp( DNIS VARCHAR(50) ,Tag1 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag2 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag3 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag4 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag5 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag6 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag7 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag8 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag9 VARCHAR (300) ,Tag10 VARCHAR (300) ,Licensed XML ,[Status] INT ,LastCDR DATETIME ,Vendor VARCHAR(100) ,RespOrg VARCHAR(100) ,ClientId INT ,ClientName VARCHAR(100) ,[Owner] VARCHAR(100) ,LicensingType INT ,LicensingFilter INT DEFAULT(1), RowNumber int )
---------------------------- -- Define column to sort ---------------------------- IF (@SortColumn IS NOT NULL) SET @SortColumnReal = CASE @SortColumn WHEN 'DNIS' THEN 'n.Number' WHEN 'Campaign' THEN 'dtmf.CampaignIdentifier' WHEN 'LastCDR' THEN 'LastCDR'--'c.[Start]' WHEN 'Vendor' THEN 'v.Name' WHEN 'RespOrg' THEN 'RespOrg' WHEN 'ClientId' THEN 'cl.ID' WHEN 'ClientName' THEN 'cl.Name' WHEN 'Owner' THEN 'Owner' WHEN '' THEN 'n.Number' ELSE @SortColumn
END ELSE SET @SortColumnReal = 'n.Number'
---------------------------- -- Define Type Sort ---------------------------- SET @SortType = CASE WHEN @IsAscendentSort = 1 THEN 'ASC' ELSE 'DESC' END
---------------------------- -- Define Sql query ----------------------------
SELECT @SqlCommand = ' SELECT c1.ClientID, c1.DNIS, c1.[Start], c1.VendorID INTO #calls FROM Calls.Calls c1, ( SELECT c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS, MAX(c2.[Start]) AS LastDate FROM Calls.Calls c2 WHERE c2.ClientId = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ' GROUP BY c2.ClientID, c2.DNIS ) AS c3 WHERE c1.ClientID = c3.ClientID AND c1.DNIS = c3.DNIS AND c1.[Start] = c3.LastDate AND c1.ClientID = ' + cast(@ClientId as varchar) + ';
WITH PaginatedQuery AS ( SELECT DISTINCT n.Number AS DNIS ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 1) as Tag1 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 2) as Tag2 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 3) as Tag3 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 4) as Tag4 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 5) as Tag5 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 6) as Tag6 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 7) as Tag7 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 8) as Tag8 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 9) as Tag9 ,[Searches].[GetTagValueOfDnis] (cl.ID,' + CHAR(39) + 'DNIS' + CHAR(39) + ', n.Number, 10) as Tag10
,CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS Status ,c.[Start] as LastCDR ,v.Name AS Vendor ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS RespOrg ,cl.ID AS ClientId ,cl.Name AS ClientName ,' + CHAR(39) + '' + CHAR(39) + ' AS Owner ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType + ') AS RowNumber FROM Dnis.Numbers n JOIN Dnis.LicensedNumbers ln ON ln.Number = n.Number JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ld ON ld.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ld.Number = ln.Number JOIN #calls AS c ON c.ClientID = ld.ClientID AND c.DNIS = ld.Number JOIN Vendors.Vendors v ON v.ID = c.VendorID JOIN Clients.Clients cl ON cl.ID = ln.ClientID WHERE 1=1 '
IF (@ClientId IS NOT NULL AND @ClientId <> -1) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND ln.ClientID = ' + CONVERT (VARCHAR (15),@ClientId) END
IF (@DNIS IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND n.Number IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@DNIS + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Tags IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + 'AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM Clients.Tags T INNER JOIN Clients.TagAssignments TA ON ta.TagID = t.ID AND ta.ClientID = ln.ClientID AND ta.SourceID = n.Number WHERE t.ClientId = ln.ClientId AND t.Id in (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) +@Tags + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ')) AND ta.AppliesSince <= SYSUTCDATETIME() AND (ta.AppliesUntil IS NULL OR ta.AppliesUntil >= SYSUTCDATETIME() ))' END
IF (@Status IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND CASE WHEN n.IsProvisioned = 1 THEN 1 --Ready ELSE 2 --Pending END IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Status + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
IF (@Vendor IS NOT NULL) BEGIN SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' AND v.ID IN (SELECT * FROM dbo.fnSplit('+ CHAR(39) + @Vendor + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + ',' + CHAR(39) + '))' END
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' GROUP BY n.Number, dtmf.CampaignIdentifier, dtmf.MediaSource, dtmf.ProductCode, n.IsProvisioned, c.[Start], v.Name, cl.ID, cl.Name'
--SET -- @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ' ORDER BY ' + @SortColumnReal + ' ' + @SortType
SET @SqlCommand = @SqlCommand + ') '
DECLARE @SqlPagination VARCHAR(MAX) SET @SqlPagination = 'SELECT * FROM PaginatedQuery WHERE RowNumber BETWEEN ((' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ') - (' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '-1)) AND (' + cast(@PageNumber as varchar) + ' * ' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + '); '
--INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS, Campaign, Media, Product, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner]) INSERT INTO #tblTemp(DNIS,Tag1, Tag2, Tag3, Tag4, Tag5, Tag6, Tag7, Tag8, Tag9, Tag10, [Status],LastCDR, Vendor, RespOrg, ClientId, ClientName, [Owner], RowNumber) EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlPagination)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET #tblTemp.Licensed = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Details, #tblTemp.LicensingType = Dnis.LicensingDetails.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp INNER JOIN Dnis.LicensingDetails ON #tblTemp.ClientId = Dnis.LicensingDetails.ClientID AND #tblTemp.DNIS = Dnis.LicensingDetails.Number
IF @LicensingType > 0 BEGIN --PRINT 'Licensing Type: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), @LicensingType)
UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE LicensingType <> @LicensingType
IF LEN(ISNULL(@LicensingDetails, '')) > 0 BEGIN
DECLARE Ptr CURSOR FOR SELECT DNIS, Licensed, ClientId FROM #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 1
DECLARE @IdDnis VARCHAR(20), @XMLData XML, @IdCurClient INT
OPEN Ptr
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
IF @LicensingType = 1 --Region BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.Region FROM Dnis.GetRegionFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails,',') AS YYY ON XXX.Region = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 2 --States BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.[State] FROM Dnis.GetStatesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.[State] = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END END ELSE IF @LicensingType = 3--AreaCode BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT XXX.AreaCode FROM Dnis.GetAreaCodesFromXml(@XMLData) AS XXX INNER JOIN Util.SplitString(@LicensingDetails, ',') AS YYY ON XXX.AreaCode = YYY.Item) BEGIN --PRINT 'Deleted!' UPDATE #tblTemp SET LicensingFilter = 0 WHERE DNIS = @IdDnis AND ClientId = @IdCurClient END
END
FETCH NEXT FROM Ptr INTO @IdDnis, @XMLData, @IdCurClient END
CLOSE Ptr DEALLOCATE Ptr
END
DELETE #tblTemp WHERE LicensingFilter = 0 END
------------------------------ ---- Return final records ------------------------------ SELECT t.DNIS ,t.Licensed ,ISNULL(t.Tag1,'') Tag1 ,ISNULL(t.Tag2,'') Tag2 ,ISNULL(t.Tag3,'') Tag3 ,ISNULL(t.Tag4,'') Tag4 ,ISNULL(t.Tag5,'') Tag5 ,ISNULL(t.Tag6,'') Tag6 ,ISNULL(t.Tag7,'') Tag7 ,ISNULL(t.Tag8,'') Tag8 ,ISNULL(t.Tag9,'') Tag9 ,ISNULL(t.Tag10,'') Tag10 ,t.[Status] ,t.LastCDR ,t.Vendor ,t.RespOrg ,t.ClientId ,t.ClientName ,t.[Owner] ,t.LicensingType FROM #tblTemp t ORDER BY t. RowNumber
------------------------------ ---- Return Totals ------------------------------ DECLARE @SqlTotals as Varchar(max) SET @SqlTotals = 'SELECT T.Total as TotalRows, CASE WHEN T.Total%' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' = 0 THEN T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ' ELSE (T.Total/' + cast(@RowsPerPage as varchar) + ')+1 END AS TotalPages From (SELECT COUNT(1) AS Total FROM PaginatedQuery) T' EXEC (@SqlCommand + ' ' + @SqlTotals)
DROP TABLE #tblTemp
END"
